function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of specific credits in LEED for mental health category","Impact":"Neglecting mental health considerations in building design and construction","Mitigation":"Explore alternative certification programs or implement mental health design principles without credit incentives","Technologies":"Biophilic design, circadian lighting systems, acoustic treatments","People":"Occupants, visitors, and building users","Owner":"Architects, designers, and building owners"},{"Description":"No matching credits in LEED for specific categories (PVP2 and PVP5)","Impact":"Limited guidance and incentives for incorporating specific sustainable practices related to PVP2 and PVP5","Mitigation":"Seek other sustainability certifications or integrate best practices without credit incentives","Technologies":"Energy management systems, renewable energy solutions, water conservation technologies","People":"Design and construction teams, building owners","Owner":"Project stakeholders and sustainability consultants"}]}
